4:
For example:
vs is an abbreviation for versus
versus is italic
you want to clear the italic format after versus

Steps to create that snippet using the rich text editor:
type versus and a few (two) spaces
format all as italic
select the ending spaces → remove format

The result rich text snippet will have this source:
<p><em>versus</em>&nbsp;</p>
You can also use the above html code to create similar snippets.
5:
For example:

  1. vs is an abbreviation for versus
  2. versus is italic
  3. you want to clear the italic format after versus

 

Steps to create that snippet using the rich text editor:

  1. type versus and a few (two) spaces
  2. format all as italic

  3. select the ending spaces → remove format

 

The result rich text snippet will have this source:

<p><em>versus</em> </p>

You can also use the above html code to create similar snippets.
